items.title: Sudan bans all imports from Kenya after it hosted civil war rivals
items.description: The ban follows months of escalating diplomatic tensions between Kenya and Sudan.

items.title: Iran using drones and apps to enforce women's dress code
items.description: Iranian officials are encouraging people to report women who refuse to obey the Islamic republic's dress code, according to a UN report.

items.title: British man killed by president's convoy in Kenya hit-and-run
items.description: The car did not stop after hitting Edgar Charles Frederick, 79, on a road in the capital, Nairobi.

items.title: US had 'productive' talks with Putin over Ukraine war, Trump says
items.description: US envoy Steve Witkoff met Putin in Moscow on Thursday where they discussed the peace process.

items.title: Florence and Pisa on alert as flooding hits Italy
items.description: Tuscany's president advises residents to exercise "the utmost attention and caution".
